data_sources.description: Dataset containing rankings of Indian universities based on various parameters.

data_variables.name: df
data_variables.description: DataFrame containing the data from the ranked universities, including various metrics for each university.

data_variables.name: int_features
data_variables.description: List of integer-type features in the dataset, specifically containing the rank of the universities.

data_variables.name: float_features
data_variables.description: List of float-type features utilized for the analysis: TLR, RPC, GO, and OI.

data_variables.name: obj_features
data_variables.description: List of categorical features, which include identifiers like institute_id, name, city, and state.

data_variables.name: report_df
data_variables.description: ProfileReport object generated by pandas-profiling, providing a detailed report of the DataFrame.

data_flow.description: DataFrame created by reading the CSV file into pandas for analysis.
data_flow.flow: Used for data exploration, preprocessing, and model setup.

data_flow.description: Filtered DataFrame containing entries without null values in 'perception' and dropping that column.
Setup function prepares the data for regression analysis using Pycaret.
data_flow.flow: Model training will occur at a later point within the notebook.

data_flow.description: Report generated to analyze the dataset.
data_flow.flow: Used for exploratory analysis and summary statistics.
